name: Clan McMeadow
body:
### These are the neighbours!
The grass is always greener at your neighbour's. And that's not just because of a play of the sun light either. Clan McMeadow _is_ your neigbour, so we have the greenest grass around.

## So what's it you're doing then?
The thing we're good at is keeping our lane clean and our grass green. So you can admire it. When we're talking about grass, we don't mean the stuff you smoke. That's called _weed_ over here.

(Just some sample content to figure out the page generator - never mind)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
